snippet.title: "At Least 10 Years" Johnny Depp Speaks on His Hope for Amber's Prison Time
snippet.description:
"At Least 10 Years" Johnny Depp Speaks on His Hope for Amber's Prison Time
Following a major setback in his ongoing legal battle with ex wife Amber Heard and the British tabloid the Sun, Johnny Depp fans organise once more on social media for vengeance. Meanwhile, Amber Heard Johnny has been sneaky on Instagram, and his followers are furious. But does it imply Johnny won't be able to prove his innocence?

In April 2018, the Sun published the now infamous column written by the tabloid executive editor Dan Wooten under the headline Gone Potty In his column, Wooten slammed Jk Rowling's decision to keep Johnny in the film and accused the author of being blinded by a personal friendship with the actor.

💗 Hope you liked the video and would consider leaving a like and telling us what you thought in the comments!

We have put together a few similar videos that you might like:
Johnny Depp REACTION To Amber Heard Destroying Her Own Career: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dge8Eyp0x_U
New iCarly Information Revealed! (Filming Location, New Set, Bigger cast): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EM26omPPFlo
Shane Dawson Is Back To Social Media! (Back To Stay?): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lL8PGDcqyDk

Here on Viral League we are all about the latest celebrity drama! We loving staying updated on our favorite celebs and putting videos together for you guys to stay updated on all the latest spill and Hollywood news! If this is something for you, then make sure to hit that subscribe button: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcvD8ANBq3H9i1ozzznAn1A?sub_confirmation=1

#JohnnyDeppHopes #AmberHeardJail #JusticeForJohnny #ViralLeague
